title: The Fastest Gaming PC I've Ever Built...
description: Watch the original personal gaming PC build:  Intel Core i9-9900K on Amazon:  Nvidia RTX 2080 Ti on Amazon:   With the brand new 9th gen Intel Core i9-9900K along with the Nvidia RTX 2080 Ti graphics card on board, it's time for a refresh of my gaming computer ALREADY.  By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
